message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is an exceptional opportunity that we believe could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique value and potential benefits, we are offering it to you for $1500000. We understand that this might be a substantial amount, but we are confident that the investment would pay off handsomely. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further or if you have any questions.

Thank you for the opportunity to discuss the product. I'm interested in purchasing it, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe the product has great potential, but I'd like to discuss the value and benefits further to see if we can meet in the middle.
